active_skill_gems.name: Cleave
active_skill_gems.description: The character swings their weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc, damaging monsters in an area in front of them. Only works with Axes and Swords.

active_skill_gems.name: Cleave of Rage
active_skill_gems.description: he character swings both their weapons in an arc, damaging monsters in an area in front of them. Requires dual wielding both an Axe and a Sword.
